signals.label: Small Clarity Gain
signals.meaning: The session produced a slight clarity shift (low delta). Early progress is visible and can compound with continued reflection.
signals.example_feedback: A slight shift — I’m starting to see things more clearly.

signals.label: Medium Clarity Gain
signals.meaning: The session delivered a noticeable improvement in perspective (moderate delta), resolving some uncertainty.
signals.example_feedback: Nice — that reflection gave me clearer perspective and resolved some uncertainty.

signals.label: Large Clarity Gain
signals.meaning: The session produced a strong clarity jump (high delta), indicating a meaningful reframing or new insight.
signals.example_feedback: Strong clarity jump — I reframed my thinking and found a real insight.
